amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit application of the bill to firearms maufacturers only.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 108-64 to limit the protection against liability lawsuits in the bill only to manufacturers of firearms and ammunition and only when their products are used in criminal activity.
